page.title: 08Housing. The Mount
page.content: The Mount site has been bought by "Bovis Homes" for private houses development.The houses are very new ones built in 1984-85.There will be 39 houses on the site.Each one will have a garage.Altogether there are 15 with single with garages and 24 houses with double garages.Each house will cost between Â£56,500 and Â£90,000.The houses were built to a certain specification. The houses are being built by subcontracters and the houses are all double glazed.All the houses are detached.There are two houses with five bedrooms,one house with three bedrooms and the rest have four bedrooms.They all have three toilets and two bathrooms.Each house has three reception rooms.It will take 15 months to build all 39 houses.The rateable value will be about Â£500.
